root.name: Flips: The Enchanted Wood
root.description: PremiseJoe, Beth, and Frannie wander into the magic forest that materializes at the doorstep of their country cottage. Together with Moonface, Silky the Fairy, and Saucepan Man, they venture across fantastical lands, including Toy Land and the land of Take-What-You-Want. Features The Enchanted Woodfeatures 1171 pages of narrated content, and a detailed biography of 20th century author Enid Blyton. Every chapter can be previewed via Download Play to any Nintendo DSi system.
